welcome_message_body: Welcome to Soresina, the charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brescia Montichiari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
